item.description:
CASTLE OF KNIGHTS
1599 Memorial Drive, Chicopee, MA
$5 per person, bring a can of food -- only $4

Real Oldies 1250 Dance featuring
‘The Soul Sensations’
8:30pm – 1:00pm $5 per person
http://www.thesoulsen...
Song list includes
Let’s Get It On - Marvin Gaye
Waiting On The World To Change - John Mayer
If I Ain't Got You - Alicia Keys
I'll Be There - Mariah Carey
Crazy For You - Madonna
Celebration - Kool and The Gang
Respect - Aretha Franklin
1999 - Prince plus much more
Lady Marmalade - Labelle
Mustang Sally - Wilson Pickett
Sexual Healing - Marvin Gaye
Here and Now - Luther Vandross
My Girl - The Temptations
Super Freak - Rick James
I Feel Good - James Brown
Proud Mary - Ike and Tina Turner
Knocks Me Off My Feet - Donell Jones
There is a free senior fair with workshops from 10 - 7 before the event

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Soul Sensations in Chicopee
